name: Central banks (including multilateral development banks) and General government (including international organisations)
description:
Credit institutions as defined in Regulation (EU) No 680/2014 Annex V, which specifies that multilateral development banks shall be classified as credit institutions and General government as defined in Regulation (EU) No 680/2014 Annex V, which specifies that international organisations shall be classified as general governments.
This purpose of this member is to map FinRep into the reference codification system.
